com.asm.lib.io

Class FileBrowser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.asm.lib.io.FileBrowser

  • public class FileBrowser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to get the listing of a directory. FileBrowser fb = new FileBrowser(); fb.setDirectory ("/sdcard/test"); optional, default="/sdcard" fb.setSortCaseSensitive(true); // optional, default=false fb.setPattern(".*\.txt"); // optional, default=".*" String[] df = fb.getDirsAndFiles

      • setPattern

        public void setPattern(java.lang.String pattern)
        Sets a regex pattern which will be used in getFiles but not in getDirectories().
        Parameters:
        pattern - The regex pattern string. null will behave as ".*" but faster

      • setSortCaseSensitive

        public void setSortCaseSensitive(boolean sensitive)
        Defines whether the files and dirs are sorted case sensitive or not. Default is sorting case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        sensitive - set to true for case sensitive sorting

        protected void walk(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dirs,
